pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 13, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, June 13, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with young public servants for National Public Service Week.

Closed to media.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Nishnawbe Aski Nation (NAN) Youth with Ministers Bennett and Philpott.

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chief of Attawapiskat, Bruce Shisheesh, with Ministers Bennett and Philpott.

Closed to media.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
